remarks: Lemma for ~ cnpfcf .  If a function is continuous at a point, it respects clustering there.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 20-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Aug-2015.)
statement: cnpfcfi $p |- ( ( K e. Top /\ A e. ( J fClus L ) /\ F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` A ) ) -> ( F ` A ) e. ( ( K fClusf L ) ` F ) ) $.
